txt.en: 'While you are out among the Slag-hills, would you be kind enough to survey the Enemy strongholds of Carchost, Narchost, and the Morannon?\n\n'It is imperative that we have the latest movements of the Enemy.'
Travelling any closer to Morannon would surely lead to a swift death
The entrance does not seem to be heavily guarded
Narchost overlooks much of the western Slag-hills
The entrance to the tower seems to be guarded by the entire Orc encampment
You should return to Thurindol, who can be found at the small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.
Carchost overlooks much of the eastern Slag-hills
Good vantage points can be found around the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should survey the Black Gate and the Towers of the Teeth.

You relate to Thurindol what you saw.\n\n'The Morannon has not changed? That is as I expected. The movements you describe around Narchost are interesting. I do not know what to make of it. And Carchost is heavily guarded, you say? That must mean there is something of great importance within the tower now.'
Thurindol requires more information on the structures within the Slag-hills, and wishes for you to survey the territory.
